column4: any idea how to get grub to allow me to boot into my other distro? I'm having probs >_<
Grub ist configured in /boot/grub/menu.lst - you can add other distros there.
I know but when i try to add the parameters i get file not found when trying to boot the distro i;m not sure if i am adding the correct info
please paste your menu.lst to pastebin and give some information to which partitions you installed the other distro.
